songs.title: Cont on you
songs.lyrics: Family broken so I stand with my niggas showed up to every shootout but I ran from fellings no time for those I got a plan to get million who ever don't agree I see u in the back of them buildings that’s why I never let y'all act like a victim that's why I never let y’all kill my ambition. You wasn't build for the mission park my cutless in the back of the village remember Tony started washing them dishes it was all a decision fatts died he took apart of me with him heartbroken like my artery missing it's fuck all of you niggas team broke they can't harvest you nigga this war shit ain't got a heart to it nigga
